products.title: Splash Pebble Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash pebble grey is a soft light grey perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous grey blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.
